Content.Text:
<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, are you the new farmer, by any chance?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I knew it! I've heard about you. My name is
Corona. Hope to see you around!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. How are you
today?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You seem peppy
today, as usual!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. How are you today?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. Are you working hard?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. How did everything
go today? Good, I hope?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Have you finished
all your work for the day yet?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's lovely weather today, huh? Makes me want
to keep on walking forever and ever!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When it rains, it's impossible for a carpenter like
my husband to work outside, so he works at
home all day.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This summer weather sure is nice, but the heat
does make it hard to work outside.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When it rains, it's impossible for a carpenter like
my husband to work outside, so he works at
home all day.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I always love going for walks on brisk autumn
days like this.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
On a rainy day, it's impossible for a carpenter like
my husband to work outside, so he works at
home all day.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's sunny out, but still cold. Must be tough to
do farm work in this kind of chill.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, look at all this snow. After it stops coming
down, I should make a snowman.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I try to stay home on days like this. Hope the
wind doesn't cause too much damage, or we'll
all be busy cleaning it up.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, quite a lot of snow today. If it keeps up, I'll
have to build a snowman.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I heard the news! You're seeing
someone, right?
<PAGE>
Invite me to your wedding, won't you? I
guarantee you, I'm always a hit at parties!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I talk with Veronica here sometimes. Mostly just
about business, though.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's fun to people-watch at the inn. You see so
many different types coming and going. Plus,
there's Melanie, and she's super cute. ♪

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you have shopping to do too?
Hmmm...what should I buy today?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since I'm always all cooped up in the shop, I
need to get out from time to time. And boy,
does that fresh air ever taste great!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When things slow down at work, I like to take a
nice stroll. Keeps me in shape!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How's your house holding up? Is there anything
you want to fix?
<PAGE>
If you need any work done, please let us know
anytime.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, what made you want to be a
farmer?
<PAGE>
Me, well, carpentry's not really my thing, but
Gunther loves it, and I'd take any job to work
with him.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My main job is keeping up the store. Gunther
handles almost all the big orders.
<PAGE>
The man knows his trade. He's got clients all
across the country.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I first came to this town just for Gunther. Didn't
expect the place to be so friendly, but it is.
<PAGE>
And it's not like they're only nice to me because
I'm Gunther's wife. People here are just naturally
kind. Some are a little quirky, but...

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Gunther's wonderful, and this town is great, so
I'd be happy if everything just carried on the way
it is now.
<PAGE>
Don't get me wrong; I don't mind if the town
keeps growing and getting more famous. I just
want to hold on to the life we have here.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Before I came here, I was working part-time and
helping my mother out at home. Marriage was
the last thing on my mind.
<PAGE>
One day, our house needed some work done,
and along came Gunther.
<PAGE>
He seemed weird at first. But then I watched
him work, and...well, there's something about a
working man, isn't there?
<PAGE>
My family didn't care for him much, but
eventually I moved away from them, and here
we are together, husband and wife.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. You're working hard.
Gunther's been impressed.
<PAGE>
It's always fun talking to you, so stop by the
shop anytime.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, you want to give me this? It's my favorite.
Did you know that, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Well, whether it's a coincidence or not, I
appreciate it. Thank you!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, a present for me? I love these! I didn't know
you knew that.
<PAGE>
Thank you! I appreciate it!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like this! Thank you very much.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What? This is for me? Oh, thank you!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You want to give me this...? Well, thanks.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hm... Is this supposed to be...for me?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Well, far be it from me to turn down a present...

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Oh, for me, huh? I...don't know what to say...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Guess I probably shouldn't say anything. I
mean...thanks.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you're giving me this? How'd you know it
was my favorite?
<PAGE>
And it's golden... Flashy, isn't it? I appreciate it.
Thank you!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, this is great! And it's golden... Thank you
very much.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Wow, look at this golden flash. You really
want to give me this? Then I won't say no.
Thank you.
Let's not give her a present now.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't need to be that generous with me.
Some other time.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want to give me another present? Nah, I
can't take that much all at once. Maybe
tomorrow.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you want to give me this? Did you know
these were my favorite, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
...A birthday present? Well, thank you very much
for being so thoughtful!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, is that a birthday present? For who? Wait,
me? Oh, today is my birthday! I forgot.
<PAGE>
Oh, I love these! Thank you! I appreciate it.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a nice birthday present! I really like
this! Thank you very much.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmm? You want to give me this? Really, for
me?
<PAGE>
A birthday present...? Thank you!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? What's this for...? ...I see, it's a birthday
present for me, huh...? ...No, it's great... Thank
you.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm...? Wait, is this a birthday present for me?!
<PAGE>
Well, I don't wanna be rude, so I'll take it...

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's this for? What? It's a birthday present for
me...? Well, what should I say...?
<PAGE>
Oh, nothing... Thank you.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, is that a birthday present? For who? Me?!
Oh, today is my birthday, isn't it?
<PAGE>
Oh, wow. These are my favorite! I didn't know
you knew that.
<PAGE>
And it's golden... Look at that flash! I appreciate
it. Thank you!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? A birthday present for me?!
<PAGE>
Oh, this is great! And it's golden! Thank you very
much.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, it's all golden and flashy and everything.
You're sure I can have this?
<PAGE>
Oh, it's a birthday present? Then sure, thank you
very much!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, what a cute little bunny! Look at him
sniff.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's cute, but I don't know if I can trust it.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's an ermine! Look how cute it is.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's cute.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's an Angora rabbit, isn't it? I like its fur. So
fluffy.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
...That's so adorable.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can tolerate that thing, just not up close.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, that's adorable! Are you keeping it,
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, don't get me wrong -- I like chubby dogs.
But I think that one might be a little too chubby.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that dog looks like a smart one.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That dog looks a little too chubby. It's cute...but
you should probably put it on a diet.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ooh, what a cute cat!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, look at the fluffy little kitty! ...Probably a
little too fluffy, actually. Might want to cut down
on the kitty snacks.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What an adorable cat. I like the long hair. It's so
soft and gorgeous.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, look at the fluffy little kitty! ...Probably a
little too fluffy, actually. Might want to cut down
on the kitty snacks.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's a lovely flower. For the Flower Fair,
right? Thank you.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, that's a blue feather, isn't it? You should
save that for someone you really love.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You should save that ring for someone you really
love.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like this wrapping! I'm sure there's something
amazing inside. ...Ooh, exciting!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, a present for me? What's in there?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday! Here: To you from me.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today's your birthday, isn't it? Happy birthday!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Long time no see.
<PAGE>
You can always stop by here anytime you're free.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like that jacket. That's my favorite color.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Looks like you're ready to work hard today.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like the clothes you're wearing. That's my
favorite color.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that outfit looks good for farm work. And
you're a farmer, so it fits you perfectly.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't think I've ever seen clothes like that. I
wonder which country they come from.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a lovely outfit! And I like the coloring,
too.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a stylish outfit. I'm curious which
country it comes from.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Going with a tropical theme today, hmm?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I like that skirt. It's cute. Looks like an ethnic
outfit.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a beautiful coat. It looks good on you.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look good without sleeves, you know.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's a beautiful down jacket. Looks good
on you.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, that's really stylish. And the color is nice,
too.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a cute outfit! I like the color, too.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Going with a simple look today, are you? I like
it.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you look like a child today. But I have to say
it's cute.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, I like the color of the cardigan you're
wearing.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a stylish outfit you've got on! Very nice.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The clothes you're wearing are so cute. They
look good on you, too.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
He he, it's <MYNAME>, isn't it? Looking good.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like your hat. It's cute and it looks good on
you.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like that flower clip. It's so beautiful.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a lovely hat you've got.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a perfect hat for a farmer, isn't it?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like the hair band. It looks good on you.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you're wearing a beret. That's so cool.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you're a sailor today. You look adorable.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like the color of those glasses.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like the color of those glasses.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That mask makes you look...suspicious.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
<NAME_CHLOE>...Gunther...

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry. It's my bedtime, so...

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hold on and let me finish this, if you don't mind.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's been a long time since I've seen a seesaw. I
wanna ride on it.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you make that cow out of snow? Looks
nice.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a beautiful cherry blossom tree. We
should have a party here.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like that you use so much yellow around here.
Yellow's my favorite color. ♪

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I really like all the red things around here.
Gunther likes red, too. We're a perfect couple,
don't you think?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like these decorations here. They remind me of
autumn.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The decorations here are very relaxing. Gunther
told me he feels the same way. I guess couples
share a lot of the same feelings, don't they?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Amazing! It's like a zoo here. Looks like they're
about to move!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This place is like a winter wonderland. I just
hope all the snow doesn't melt.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town's gotten really famous. Who'd have
thought our little hamlet would ever be a trading
center for people from all over the world?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town's getting busier these days. It's nice to
see your hometown so lively, isn't it?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like this town. It's slow here, but it's relaxing.
Maybe a little too quiet sometimes, but I can live
with that.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There aren't too many stores in this town, but
I've never had a problem buying things.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town's small, and I like it that way, but I
wouldn't complain if we had a few more places
to shop.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I didn't even realize how great this place has
gotten. Business is booming, there're new stores
everywhere, and everybody's happy about it.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here you are. This is your allowance for today.
Use it wisely, okay?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry, but if you need something, please talk
to me across the counter.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like this bench. It's nice.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like this lamp. Could you put one near my
house?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've never seen a lamp like that before. It's got
this nice, warm light. I like it.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a fancy table. But isn't it a little too low?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a lovely bench. It looks bright, and
comfortable too.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a big umbrella. What's it for...?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's always good to have a fountain in town. It
refreshes everyone who walks by it.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, a swing. Makes me wanna hop right on it,
like when I was a kid.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like this plaza. It's cozy and relaxing.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you make that sheep out of snow? I'm
impressed.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you make that bird out of snow? You're
talented.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a beautiful tree! I like the color.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a nice pole. I like the color.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a beautiful gate. I like the color.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I saw that decoration in a picture once, made of
pine and bamboo and put in front of a house.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've seen that mechanical lion before. I hear they
use it in some kind of festival.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These sunflowers are beautiful.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like Hilton daisies, too. So beautiful.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These sunflowers are beautiful.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like Hilton daisies, too. So beautiful.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like bamboo trees. Of course, this one's potted,
so it's still on the small side.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like cherry blossoms, but if this one's potted,
it's hard to have a party under it.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, a flower basket. Cute!

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a beautiful topiary. You're really good at
this.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since there's a bamboo bush, there're gonna be
bamboo shoots, right?

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice tricycle pot. It's a very cute
decoration for a garden.

<FACE_CHLOE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That boot pot makes a perfect garden
decoration, doesn't it?
